channel.title: Getting-starteds on Monstache
channel.description: Recent content in Getting-starteds on Monstache

item.title: Getting started
item.description: Installation Monstache is just a single binary without dependencies on runtimes like Ruby, Python or PHP. You just need to download the latest version. Let’s make sure Monstache is set up as expected. You should see a similar version number in your terminal: monstache -v # 3.1.0 Configuration Monstache uses the MongoDB oplog as an event source. You will need to make sure that MongoDB is configured to produce an oplog.
